short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of the games you want to buy on PlayStation Store and their prices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an alternative solution for keeping track of the games you want to buy on Playstation Store and helps to make sure you don't miss a sale event.  

Features:
- Easily add a game to your Wishlist by opening the extension when on a product's PSN Store page and clicking the "Add" button.
- The extension will keep track of your selections and periodically update the prices in the background.
- The extension's badge icon will show the number of games currently on sale.
- Clicking the game's title will take you directly to its store page.
- Sort your Wishlist by title or current price.

If you liked this extension, please consider leaving a review. Thanks!
